name: 彭暐潔
objective:
本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生文法與發音為主。

使用教材: Practical Grammar / 實用英文文法 (Level 2 / 中階)
schedule:
0917	(no class) 
0924	Introduction
1001	Units 1-5
1008	Units 6-10
1015	Units 11-15
1022	Units 16-20
1029	Units 21-25
1105	Units 26-30
1112	mid-term exam; Units 31-35
1119	Units 36-40
1126	Units 41-45
1203	Units 46-50
1210	Units 51-55
1217	Units 56-60
1214	Units 61-65
1224	Units 66-70
1231	(no class)
0107	Units 71-75
0114	final exam; Units 76-80
scorePolicy:
暫定: 
1. attendance, grammar handouts, participation, etc.: 30%
2. assignments and quizzes: 20% 	
3. mid-term& final exams: 50%
